titleStmt.title: A briefe note of the benefits that grow to this realme, by the obseruation of fish-daies with a reason and cause wherefore the law in that behalfe made, is ordained. Very necessarie to be placed in the houses of all men, especially common victualers.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by A. Mathewes?] for Henry Gosson and Francis Coules,

notesStmt.note: Another edition of STC 9976.5, dated 20 March 1593.
Suggested printer's name and publication from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
